com.salimov.yurii.util.cache

Class Cache

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.salimov.yurii.util.cache.Cache

  • public final class Cache
extends java.lang.Object
    The class implements a set of methods for working with cache.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Yurii Salimov (yuriy.alex.salimov@gmail.com)
    See Also:
    CacheCleaner, ThreadDaemonFactory, Key

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static java.util.Map<Key,java.lang.Object> cache
      The map where can be stored some objects.
      private static long SCHEDULER_INITIAL_DELAY
      The time to delay first execution (5 hours).
      private static long SCHEDULER_PERIOD
      The period between successive executions (1 hour).
      private static java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit TIME_UNIT
      Time unit representing one hour.

      • get

        public static <T> java.lang.Object get(T key)
        Returns object from cache with key. Returns null if key is null.
        Type Parameters:
        T - a type of key.
        Parameters:
        key - a object key in the cache.
        Returns:
        The object with key or null.

      • getAll

        public static java.util.Collection<java.lang.Object> getAll(java.lang.String subKey)
        Returns all objects from cache with subKey.
        Parameters:
        subKey - a object key in the cache.
        Returns:
        The objects with key or empty list.

      • remove

        public static <T> void remove(T key)
        Removes object from cache with key. Removes object if key is not null.
        Type Parameters:
        T - a type of key.
        Parameters:
        key - a object key in the cache.

      • removeAll

        public static void removeAll(java.lang.String... keys)
        Removes all objects from the cache if they key contains the string subKey. Removes objects if subKey is not blank. The objects are removed in a parallel thread.
        Parameters:
        keys - a key string.

      • setAll

        public static <T> void setAll(java.util.Map<T,java.lang.Object> map)
        Sets map with objects.
        Type Parameters:
        T - a type of key.
        Parameters:
        map - a map with objects.

      • clear

        public static void clear()
        Clears the cache.

      • clear

        public static void clear(java.lang.Class object)
        Clears objects by class.
        Parameters:
        object - a objects class to remove.

      • exist

        public static <T> boolean exist(T key)
        Checks if exist object with the key in the cache.
        Type Parameters:
        T - a type of key.
        Parameters:
        key - a object key in the cache.
        Returns:
        true if object is exist, false otherwise.

      • getEntriesToString

        public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getEntriesToString()
        Returns information about objects in cache. Information about cache saved in cache too.
        Returns:
        The maps with entries.
